title: 3 BEDRROM 2 BATH HOUSE FOR RENT!
posting_body: BEAUTIFUL 3 BEDROOM 2 BATHROOM SINGLE HOME FOR RENT.GREAT LOCATION, COMFORTABLE LAYOUT WITH SPACIOUS BEDROOMS, GREAT KITCHEN WITH PLENTY OF COUNTER AND CABINET SPACE.
EASY 2 CAR GARAGE ACCESS, SPACIOUS YARD, OPEN LIVING ROOM CONCEPT.WASHER AND DRYER ARE NOT SUPPLIED BUT HOOKUPS ARE AVAILABLE INSIDE THE HOME.
CALL TO SCHEDULE A TOUR TODAY.
-$50 Application fee per 18 years or Oder.
-We do a criminal and civil background check
-Has to make 2.5 times the rent and provide proof of income.
